page.title: 03WARBOYS CLOCK TOWER
page.content: We asked Mr. Taylor some questions about the {Clock Tower}and he said he would take us up. I had to climb up a stepladder and pull myself through a trapdoor. Inside there were two weights used for winding purposes. The room was square. Some bars came out of the wall in a triangle, I climbed them and reached another floor. Mr. Taylor closed the trapdoor. Inside was the clock. Mr. Taylor wound up the clock. Warboys {Clock Tower }is in the middle of a junction on each side there is a plaque. All the plaques are different. On the north face is a clover, on the south face is a flower, on the west face is an R, on top of a V and on the east face is a thistle. It has had to have a new clock face on it because vandals threw stones at it. It was built in {1888}. The actual clock was made by {Gillet and Co..
